text: Takeaki Amezawa (born 4 February 1995) is a Japanese cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . ==Major results== ;2016 : 6th Tour de Okinawa ;2017 : 2nd Team time trial, Asian Road Championships : 3rd Japan Cup Cycle Road Race ;2018 : 1st Stage 2 Tour of Japan : 9th Overall Tour de Kumano ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists
title: Takeaki Amezawa
